mapper.select: select * from t_banner where location=#{location} order by sortNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_banner (location, imageUrl, targetUrl, sortNo, addTime) values (#{location}, #{imageUrl}, #{targetUrl}, #{sortNo}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: select * from t_bdinfo where name=#{name} order by sortNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_bdinfo (name, title, price, imageUrl, targetUrl, sortNo, addTime) values (#{name}, #{title}, #{price}, #{imageUrl}, #{targetUrl}, #{sortNo}, #{addTime})
mapper.update: update t_bdinfo set title=#{title}, price=#{price}, imageUrl=#{imageUrl}, targetUrl=#{targetUrl}, sortNo=#{sortNo} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_article (title, content, kind, path, addTime) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{kind}, #{path}, #{addTime})
